name: Digital Highway
description:
Digital Highway is a game of fast thinking and faster reflexes!

As you move on the power lines dodge the deletion rings as you make your way to the end goal!

The game features 5 levels of increasing difficulty as more deletion rings block the player's path!

Known bugs:

-possible to come off the rails if lane switching near corners

-possible to lose more than one life when colliding with deletion rings

Digital Highway is my first game that was made in a couple of weeks, therefore some expected features may be missing and bugs still present. for example lack of resolution options and sound effects. the game will start windowed so the user can scale it down to their resolution.
